title: Return of the Jedi (Captioned)
brief_description: Light sabres hum and sparkle, the Millennium flashes through hyperspace in the blink of an eye, and creatures from the end of the galaxy prepare for battle against the oppressive Imperial Forces in this stunning third chapter of the space saga that has become the most popular trilogy ever filmed. Caption version only available. Rated: PG
